comment.author: 79445422@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called La Belle Epoque ca.1890 - ca.1914 incl. ArtDeco and ArtNouveau, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: Photo out of a serial about the fabrication of tennis balls. Translation: "The glued balls are being put in completely closed round forms and then placed in a vulcanisation kettle, in which the ball by expansion of the air takes the pure round form and is being vulcanised"
